title: The Best Flirtatious Texts that’ll Keep You on His Mind

steps.title: I have a surprise for you later 😏
steps.content: I have a surprise for you later 😏

steps.title: I can’t stop thinking about this guy. Maybe you know him…
steps.content: I can’t stop thinking about this guy. Maybe you know him…

steps.title: Have any plans later? I’d love to Netflix and chill!
steps.content: Have any plans later? I’d love to Netflix and chill!

steps.title: If you come by tonight, I promise to make it worth it.
steps.content: If you come by tonight, I promise to make it worth it.

steps.title: I can’t get you off my mind.
steps.content: I can’t get you off my mind.

steps.title: I miss you so much! Let’s see each other soon!
steps.content: I miss you so much! Let’s see each other soon!

steps.title: I dreamed about you last night.
steps.content: I dreamed about you last night.

steps.title: I must be the luckiest person in the world to have you.
steps.content: I must be the luckiest person in the world to have you.

steps.title: How are you smart, strong, and sexy?
steps.content: How are you smart, strong, and sexy?

steps.title: I can’t stop smiling. Guess someone makes me really happy 🥰
steps.content: I can’t stop smiling. Guess someone makes me really happy 🥰

steps.title: I can’t wait for tonight!
steps.content: I can’t wait for tonight!

steps.title: There’s something special waiting for you at home 😉
steps.content: There’s something special waiting for you at home 😉

steps.title: Want to play hooky tomorrow? I’m lovesick for you.
steps.content: Want to play hooky tomorrow? I’m lovesick for you.

steps.title: Just the thought of you gives me butterflies.
steps.content: Just the thought of you gives me butterflies.

steps.title: What I wouldn’t give to be in your arms.
steps.content: What I wouldn’t give to be in your arms.

steps.title: Want to come over and see my new outfit?
steps.content: Want to come over and see my new outfit?

steps.title: Good morning, handsome ❤️
steps.content: Good morning, handsome ❤️

steps.title: How about we play truth or dare?
steps.content: How about we play truth or dare?

steps.title: They say I’m crazy, but I’m only crazy about you 🤪
steps.content: They say I’m crazy, but I’m only crazy about you 🤪

steps.title: You’ve got to check this out! We talked about this yesterday.
steps.content: You’ve got to check this out! We talked about this yesterday.

steps.title: Your favorite song just came on. I miss you.
steps.content: Your favorite song just came on. I miss you.

steps.title: What do you think we’d be doing right now if we were together?
steps.content: What do you think we’d be doing right now if we were together?

steps.title: I think it’s time for our lips to schedule an in-person meeting.
steps.content: I think it’s time for our lips to schedule an in-person meeting.

steps.title: I had the best time with you last night 😊
steps.content: I had the best time with you last night 😊

steps.title: You truly get me.
steps.content: You truly get me.

steps.title: I feel the best when I’m with you.
steps.content: I feel the best when I’m with you.

steps.title: Do you remember when we took this photo?
steps.content: Do you remember when we took this photo?

steps.title: Hey there, hot stuff 😘
steps.content: Hey there, hot stuff 😘

steps.title: No one makes me laugh the way you do.
steps.content: No one makes me laugh the way you do.

steps.title: Do you make everyone melt with that smile of yours?
steps.content: Do you make everyone melt with that smile of yours?

steps.title: I’m already blushing, and the date hasn’t even started yet!
steps.content: I’m already blushing, and the date hasn’t even started yet!

steps.title: You must be fictional. No one as good-looking as you can be real.
steps.content: You must be fictional. No one as good-looking as you can be real.

steps.title: You can make any day better.
steps.content: You can make any day better.

steps.title: This painting reminds me of you.
steps.content: This painting reminds me of you.

steps.title: I’m just lying in bed, and I can’t stop thinking about you.
steps.content: I’m just lying in bed, and I can’t stop thinking about you.

steps.title: Put on your best cologne because I’m coming over 😜
steps.content: Put on your best cologne because I’m coming over 😜

steps.title: How’s your day going?
steps.content: How’s your day going?

steps.title: I’m counting down the days until I see you again.
steps.content: I’m counting down the days until I see you again.

steps.title: You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me.
steps.content: You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me.

steps.title: This meme is totally you 😂
steps.content: This meme is totally you 😂

steps.title: Can you stop by later? I need some help with something.
steps.content: Can you stop by later? I need some help with something.

steps.title: Who would’ve thought I would fall in love with my best friend?
steps.content: Who would’ve thought I would fall in love with my best friend?

steps.title: You’re truly incredible. You know that?
steps.content: You’re truly incredible. You know that?

steps.title: Someone said they saw me with the sexiest man alive yesterday…
steps.content: Someone said they saw me with the sexiest man alive yesterday…

steps.title: Counting down the seconds until I can be with you.
steps.content: Counting down the seconds until I can be with you.

steps.title: I made your favorite meal—guess what’s for dessert 😉
steps.content: I made your favorite meal—guess what’s for dessert 😉

steps.title: I know I can always count on you.
steps.content: I know I can always count on you.

steps.title: Call me on your break. This news can’t wait!
steps.content: Call me on your break. This news can’t wait!

steps.title: I can’t fall asleep. I can’t stop thinking about this awesome guy.
steps.content: I can’t fall asleep. I can’t stop thinking about this awesome guy.

steps.title: Ordered your favorite meal, and I have to say, I’m not disappointed.
steps.content: Ordered your favorite meal, and I have to say, I’m not disappointed.

steps.title: How has it been 3 years since we first met?
steps.content: How has it been 3 years since we first met?

steps.title: Should we hit the gym later?
steps.content: Should we hit the gym later?

steps.title: Just don’t work too hard—you’ll need some energy for later 😏🔥
steps.content: Just don’t work too hard—you’ll need some energy for later 😏🔥

steps.title: Off to bed!
steps.content: Off to bed! See you in my dreams!
